QuestData.Title: Return to the Surface
QuestData.Description: You should leave now. You'll find a portal behind me. It'll take you to the surface.$B$BWe'll meet again. He'll be looking for you.$B$BIt's only a matter of time until he finds you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Koltira Deathweaver aboard Orgrim's Hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: $n! We thought you were dead!$B$BWe lost a few men in that explosion... but we sure put a hurt on the Scourge. They're scrambling their forces back to the citadel and leaving big gaps in their defenses. It's time to push forward.
